entry.title: The Best Socks for Men

Ankle & Low-Cut Socks

Shopping Tips:

  • Prices fluctuate frequently based on sales and promotions
  • Many items offer Subscribe & Save discounts (typically 5-15% off)
  • Multi-packs (12-18 pairs) usually offer better value per pair
  • Check for digital coupons on product pages for additional savings
  • Prime members get free shipping on most items

entry.title: Best Selling Fruit Bowls
entry.content:
Best-Selling Fruit Bowls on Amazon

  1. Sevenblue 2 Tier Large Fruit Basket (#1 Best Seller) - ~$16-$20

    • 2-tier design with 2 mobile banana hangers
    • Metal construction with wooden handle
    • 4K+ bought in past month

  2. Auledio Iron 2-Tier Countertop Fruit Basket - ~$18-$22

    • Includes banana hanger
    • Black finish
    • 64 ounces capacity

  3. Livabber Fruit Basket Bowl with Banana Hanger - ~$20-$25

    • 3-tier metal base
    • Detachable organizer
    • Black color

  4. LIBKEN Metal Fruit Bowl with Mesh Lid - ~$22-$28

    • Includes mesh lid and basket
    • Black countertop organizer

  5. HOMKULA Ceramic Fruit Bowl (3-Tier) - ~$25-$30

    • Ceramic with metal stand
    • Gold finish, small size
    • 3K+ bought in past month

  6. Sakugi Fruit Basket (2-Tier) - ~$18-$23

    • Detachable with banana hanger
    • Wooden handle
    • Black, 8.5” D x 12.4” W x 12.3” H

  7. GILLAS 2 Tier Countertop Fruit Basket - ~$19-$24

    • 2 banana hangers
    • Rectangular storage stand
    • Wooden handle, large capacity

  8. Simple Trending Round Metal Fruit Basket - ~$15-$20

    • Rust-proof, non-slip, breathable
    • Black, 11” diameter x 3.2” H
    • 800+ bought in past monthA good fruit bowl is more than just a decorative centerpiece; it’s actually a small-scale engineering project designed to fight the inevitable march of rot.

Fruit Bowl Buying Tips

To keep your produce fresh and your kitchen looking sharp, here are the essential features to look for:

1. Airflow is Everything

This is the most critical technical feature. Fruits like bananas and apples release ethylene gas, which accelerates ripening (and eventually rotting).

  • The Fix: Look for a bowl with a perforated, wire mesh, or open-slat design.

  • Why: Good circulation allows ethylene gas to escape and prevents moisture buildup at the bottom, which is the primary cause of mold.

2. Material Matters

The material of the bowl affects temperature and hygiene:

  • Metal/Wire: Best for airflow and keeping fruit cool.

  • Ceramic/Glass: Beautiful and easy to clean, but they trap heat and gas unless they have holes.

  • Wood: Naturally breathable and looks great, but porous wood can absorb juices if a fruit over-ripens, leading to bacteria growth.

3. Surface Texture and Shape

Fruit is delicate. A bowl that is too “aggressive” will ruin your harvest.

  • Smooth Interiors: Ensure there are no sharp edges or rough welds on wire bowls that could puncture the skin of a peach or pear.

  • Broad Base: A wide, shallow bowl is superior to a deep, narrow one.

  • The “Bruise Factor”: In a deep bowl, the weight of the top fruit crushes the ones at the bottom. A shallow bowl allows you to spread the fruit out in a single or double layer.

4. The Banana Hanger

If you’re a fan of bananas, a bowl with an integrated banana hook is a game-changer.

  • The Benefit: Hanging bananas mimics how they grow on a tree, preventing “resting bruises” and keeping them away from other fruits that you might not want to ripen quite so fast.

Summary Checklist

Feature Why it matters
Breathability Prevents ethylene gas buildup and mold.
Visibility If you can see the fruit, you’re more likely to eat it before it spoils.
Size Must be large enough so fruit isn’t “suffocating” in layers.
Ease of Cleaning Fruit attracts fruit flies; the bowl needs to be easily washable.

Pro Tip: Keep your “gas-producers” (apples, avocados, bananas) separate from your “sensitive” items (leafy greens or berries) if you aren’t ready for them to ripen yet!

Shop Fruit Bowls on Amazon

It’s both Bluetooth and 2.4ghz and I use the latter all the time because it’s more efficient and I find bluetooth does not always connect as it should

entry.title: Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee Review
entry.content:
For the price I paid for these headphones, these really are great and I am listening to them right now as I write this

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee headphones are, for many, the gateway drug into the world of high-fidelity audio. Offered exclusively through Drop (formerly Massdrop), these open-back headphones are known for their exceptional value and balanced sound signature. But do they live up to the hype? Let’s dive in.

Amazon.com: Sennheiser HD 560 S Over-The-Ear Audiophile Headphones - Neutral Frequency Response, E.A.R. Technology for Wide Sound Field, Open-Back Earcups, Detachable Cable, (Black) (HD 560S)

Build Quality & Comfort:

The HD 58X Jubilee shares a similar design and construction to the classic HD 600 series, but with a slightly more budget-conscious approach. The plastic used feels sturdy enough, though not as premium as some of Sennheiser’s more expensive offerings. The detachable cable is a welcome addition, allowing for easy replacement or upgrade down the line.

Comfort is where the 58X really shines. The velour earcups are plush and breathable, making them comfortable for long listening sessions. The headband provides adequate clamping force, ensuring a secure fit without feeling overly tight. While the open-back design does leak sound, making them unsuitable for quiet environments like libraries, it also contributes to the spacious soundstage.

Sound Quality:

The sonic signature of the HD 58X Jubilee is arguably its strongest selling point. It’s remarkably balanced, with a slight emphasis on the midrange, which makes vocals and instruments sound clear and present. Bass response is tight and controlled, without being overly boomy. The treble is smooth and detailed, avoiding harshness or sibilance.

Compared to other headphones in its price range (often around $150-200 USD), the HD 58X Jubilee offers exceptional clarity and detail retrieval. The open-back design creates a wide soundstage, allowing instruments to breathe and providing a more immersive listening experience. While not the most analytical headphones, the 58X Jubilee provides a very pleasant and engaging listening experience for a variety of genres.

Pros:

  • Excellent Value: For the price, the sound quality is unmatched.
  • Balanced Sound Signature: Suitable for a wide range of music genres.
  • Comfortable: Velour earcups and well-padded headband make for long listening sessions.
  • Detachable Cable: Allows for easy replacement or upgrade.
  • Open-Back Design: Provides a wide and immersive soundstage.

Cons:

  • Build Quality: Plastic construction feels slightly budget-conscious.
  • Open-Back Design: Not suitable for quiet environments due to sound leakage.
  • Requires Amplification: While they can be driven by a smartphone, they benefit from a dedicated headphone amplifier.

Who are these headphones for?

Amazon.com: Sennheiser HD 505 - Wired Headphones Over Ear with Transparent Sound and Controlled Bass, Enhanced Comfort Studio Headphones for Music, Work, Gaming, Audiophiles, Students, Traveling, Copper Edition

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee is perfect for:

  • Budget-conscious audiophiles: Looking for an entry point into high-fidelity audio.
  • Music lovers: Who appreciate a balanced and detailed sound signature.
  • Home listeners: Who don’t need to worry about sound leakage.

Conclusion:

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee is a fantastic pair of headphones that offers exceptional value for money. While the build quality may not be the most premium, the comfort and sound quality more than make up for it. If you’re looking for a great-sounding pair of open-back headphones without breaking the bank, the HD 58X Jubilee is an excellent choice. Highly Recommended.

Shop Headphones on Amazon

entry.title: Craftsman Screwdriver Set
entry.content:
You need a few things in life, like a good barber or mechanic and if you need to do anything around the house or even assemble that new TV you bought - you need a good screwdriver set.

Take a look at craftsman screwdrivers:

Let me say this right off the bat: Do not cheap out on screwdrivers. This doesn’t mean you need to buy the most expensive tools out there but there’s time to buy a good brand name and this is one of those times. Don’t cheap out and the crap from the dollar store.

Jim’s Pick for a good screwdriver set.

Amazon.com: CRAFTSMAN Screwdriver Set, Assorted, 12Piece (CMHT65044) : Tools & Home Improvement

Pros: Cheap! About $25 gets you all the screwdrivers you will need for everyday tasks

Cons: The flathead might break on you, but it’s very rare.

Rating: 4.8 out of 5

Alternative: If the Craftsman I suggested above doesn’t do it for you, then here’s my second choice.

Amazon.com: CARTMAN Magnetic Screwdriver Set with Rack, Includs Precision Screwdriver, Magnetizer Demagnetizer and Magnetic Bowl, DIY Tools for Men : Tools & Home Improvement

This screwdriver kit has a lot more in it for not much more money at about 30 bucks. If you need a more advanced screwdriver set then this might be a good choice.

Shop All Screwdriver Sets on Amazon

entry.title: Pink Broom and Dustpan Set
entry.content:
I was not sold on this broom when we got it - not because it’s pink but because I thought the bristles were a bit stiff compared to my previous broom set.

It turns out I was wrong.

Photo by Lucas van Oort on Unsplash photo-1587027768084-c3a9076c0a43

After using this broom for a few days, you get used to it - like anything else - and for the money I paid for this broom and dustpan set, it’s fine.

Jim’s Pick for Pink Broom and Dustpan

Amazon.com: kelamayi Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, Office, Indoor&Outdoor Sweeping, Stand Up Broom and Dustpan (Pink) : Health & Household

I like this one due to the stuff brushes and the dustpan itself has some bristles that you can use to make sure all the dog hair stays in the pan and doesn’t just get moved around the bristles of the broom.

Pros: Well made and the pet hair teeth are great

Cons: the handle keeps coming unscrewed

Rating: 4.4 out of five

Alternative Option:

Amazon.com: NACENA Broom and Dustpan Set, 52-in Long Adjustable Handle Broom Dustpan Combo with Dustpan Teeth to Automatically Clean Hair Suitable for Home Kitchen Office Hall Floor（Black&Red） : Health & Household

This broom and dustpan set is cheaper by about ten bucks and looks to be pretty much the same.

Shop Brooms and Dustpans on Amazon

entry.title: Women's Zip Wallet
entry.content:
This really isn’t mine per se, but it’s the wife’s that’s considered in the household s I will write about it. Photo by Towfiqu barbhuiya on Unsplash

I hate zippered wallets, as to me they seem like another step to have to do at the counter when you need to pay so I don’t really understand the need, just like I have no reason to buy a wallet phone case as that seems like a bad idea too.

That said, here’s the wallet I would buy:

Jim’s Pick for a Women’s Zippered Wallet Michael Kors Women’s Jet Set Double Zip Wristlet, Gold-Tone Hardware/Soft Pink: Handbags: Amazon.com

This wallet by Michael Kors looks to be a lot nicer than the weirdly-named off brand wallets you can buy and it seems to hold all things you would need such as a phone and cards and ID so I don’t know what else you would need from a small wallet for women.

Pros: Excellent quality and well worth the price

Cons: The phone slot could be a bit too tight for larger phones

Rating: 4.7 out of 5

Alternative Choice Amazon.com: Travelambo Womens Wallet Tassel Bifold Ladies Clutch Wristlet Wrist strap Long Purse (Access Green Blooming) : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

Despite the weird name, the Travelambo Women’s wallet is a fraction of the price and is a good choice for those budget minded.

Shop All Women’s Wallets on Amazon

entry.title: Floor Steamer
entry.content:
She sighed. Photo by PAN XIAOZHEN on Unsplash

She wished she could afford a house cleaner, but like everything in 2025 everything got so expensive. “It’s the economy”, the excuses said but it was something else

Amazon.com: Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop with Natural Sanitization, Floor Steamer, Tile Cleaner, and Hard Wood Floor Cleaner with Flip-Down Easy Scrubber, 1940A : Everything Else

Her bad decisions. She didn’t go to college when all her friends did. She bought a car and got a good factory job. “Not everyone needs to go to college”, she told herself.

And for a while, she was right. She had the house and the fancy truck and all the trappings of the upper middle class. Her boots - her boots even screamed “I’ve made it”

Then the layoff notices came. Restructuring, they said.

The truck went first. She missed it, but it was a toy and there were other options including public transit. “It’s not that bad”, she lied to herself.

Amazon.com - Dupray Neat Steam Cleaner with 40-Piece Accessory Kit, Powerful, chemical-free cleaning for floors, cars, tiles, grout, and more. *Kills 99.9% of Bacteria & Viruses

Her friends were still there - the college-going friends. The ones that had “careers” and not just well paying jobs. But they didn’t have what she had - determination.

She sold some belongings on eBay and Craigslist and scraped up enough to buy a mop and broom and other cleaning supplies. For the first few jobs, this will have to do - and they did. She cleaned well and she cleaned fast and those 2 traits got her more and more referrals until one day she realized she didn’t want the house cleaner as she was the cleaner and she was fine with that.

The economy may still be bad, but she was doing great.

Shop Floor Steam Cleaners on Amazon

entry.title: 8x10 Photo Frames
entry.content:
He stared at the plain empty frame, and cried.

Photo by Angèle Kamp on Unsplash

The photo of his wife used to occupy the space but he couldn’t bear to look at it now that she was gone.

He was fully aware that one is not supposed to remove photos of loved ones when they passed, but for now the pain was too sharp and piercing.

Amazon.com - upsimples 8x10 Picture Frame Set of 5, Display Pictures 5x7 with Mat or 8 x 10 Without, Wall Gallery Photo Frames, Black

He fell for her hard on the first day she met, her brown hair fell to her shoulders and when she tucked it behind her ears he knew.

She didn’t know at first. He was a friend and somebody to out with from time to time. Little did she know that he wanted her and to be with her forever.

As time passed, the shared movies became more like dates and although he wasn’t considered a catch in the looks department he was kind, and kind is what she needed.

Amazon.com - upsimples 11x14 Picture Frame, Display Pictures 8x10 with Mat or 11x14 Without Mat, Wall Hanging Photo Frame, Black, 1 Pack

They had been married 40 years when she died. Cancer, as always. It was slow and horrific as one can imagine but eventually it was just too much and she passed with the winter snow.

The friends and family came and brought lasagna and told him they were sorry for his loss and although they meant well once they were gone the loss was still there and all the well wishes didn’t make a dent.

Perhaps one day the photo would go back into the frame but for now it was empty, just like his heart.

Shop Photo Frames on Amazon.

entry.title: Girl's Winter Boots
entry.content:
Where we live, winter boots are necessity regardless of age. Well, unless you’re a teen and then you just wear your Nike’s year round.

Photo by Helay Hassas on Unsplash

We’ve tried to use some Ugg Boots for the child because they are cute, but nobody really cares what a six-year-old years so this year we cheaped out and got the boots that she picked out.

Jim’s Pick for Kid’s Winter Boots

Amazon.com | Lands’ End Waterproof Kids Snow Boots - Insulated Warm Fleece Lined Winter Boots for Toddlers, Girls & Boys - Cotton Candy Pink, 10 Toddler | Boots

These ended up being a pretty good buy at about $40 on sale and we like them.

Pros: Well made, comfortable and easy to put on and off. Waterproof helps too.

Cons: There’s a chance of premature wear but kids wear through stuff at such a rate it’s not like these will be family heirlooms.

Rating: 4/3 out of Five Stars.

Buy Now

There’s probably better boots but these are name brand winter boots for kids that are easy to get into and out of, are waterproof and priced usually about $40.00 on sale.

Shop Girls Winter Boots on Amazon

entry.title: Men's Handkerchief
entry.content:
I really don’t know why one would need a handkerchief unless it was to tuck in a breast pocket on a men’s suit.

Photo by 3d illustrations on Unsplash

Jim’s Pick for Handkerchiefs:

Scotamalone Men’s Handkerchiefs 100% Soft Cotton White Hankie Hankerchieves

Pros: Soft, good quality and washability

Cons: They wrinkle easily and could be considered too thin.

Rating: 4.6 stars

Buy Now on Amazon

It seems pretty gross to me to have to use a handkerchief in 2025 when you have a more palatable option of facial tissues because somehow the idea of walking around with a pocket full of boogers isn’t my idea of a good time.

I wonder if there’s a handkerchief reddit group - I’m not going to look - where you can discuss the pros and cons of booger retrieval with handkerchief vs tissues

I would guess there would be.

Shop Men’s Hankies on Amazon

entry.title: Kids Winter Hats
entry.content:
![Ready for spring](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1678470162225-1e836562d7ae?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fit=max&fm=jpg&ixid=M3wzNjAwOTd8MHwxfHNlYXJjaHwxfHx3aW50ZXIlMjBoYXR8ZW58MHwwfHx8MTc2NDc2OTc1NHww&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&q=80&w=1080) *Photo by [Lucas van Oort](https://unsplash.com/@switch_dtp_fotografie?utm_source=Obsidian%20Image%20Inserter%20Plugin&utm_medium=referral) on [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/?utm_source=Obsidian%20Image%20Inserter%20Plugin&utm_medium=referral)*

This photo pretty much sums up the status of winter hats in our house: lost

That’s why we don’t spend a lot of money on winter hats for the kiddo because what’s the point? I usually just grab the cheapest winter hat I can find and call it a day.

Jim’s Pick for Winter Hats

Here’s a four pack of winter hats for about twelve bucks that would do the trick:

DEBAIY 3Pack Beanies Hats Knitted Caps for Men & Women & Teen (Coffee Brown/Cream White/Beige) at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

Pros: Warm in cold weather, comfortable and soft

Cons: Could be thicker in weight

Rating 4.5 stars

Buy Now on Amazon

There is absolutely no sense in buying anything greater unless the conditions are really cold and you then you should just keep the kiddos inside anyway and have them watch movies on their tablet

Shop Kids Winter Hats on Amazon

entry.title: Winter Mittens for Kids
entry.content:
Photo by Eli Pluma on Unsplash

I would be rich if I didn’t have to buy mittens for the child. This, and winter hats disappear at an alarming rate.

With this knowledge I suggest that you buy the cheapest winter mittens or gloves you can find.

Jim’s Pick

Amazon.com: 3 Pairs Kids Thicken Snow Mitten Winter Gloves Waterproof Warm Ski Mitten Toddler Boys Girls (Fluorescent Green, Pink, Purple,5-10 Years): Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

I like these because they’re cheap enough and you get 3 pairs for about 5 bucks which isn’t bad at all for kids mittens. You could buy more expensive mittens but why would you when they either get lost or eaten by the Dog?

You could go the route of clips or strings to keep the mittens somehow attatched to the child, but I found they didn’t really work that well and they still got lost.

Amazon.com : kids mittens string

entry.title: Facial Tissue
entry.content:
Don’t call them Kleenex.

Photo by Diana Polekhina on Unsplash

Jim’s Pick for Facial Tissues

Amazon Basics Facial Tissue

It’s cold and flu season here and that means the tissue consumption goes up because kids and boogers reign supreme here.

These particular tissues are cheap enough at little over one cent per sheet, which isn’t too bad considering that some days this one cent item can seem worth a whole lot more.

I don’t think I could ever get used to using a [[2025-12-04-hankerchief.md | hankerchief]] because then you’re walking [[f]] with boogers in your pocket and that’s just gross. ew.

Amazon Facial Tissue Reviews

These particular facial tissues get a pretty good review at 4.3 out of five:

Customers find these facial tissues work well as an everyday product, with good absorbency and value for money. The quality is comparable to Kleenex, and customers appreciate their absorbent 2-ply construction. The softness receives mixed feedback, with some finding them reasonably soft while others describe them as too rough. Durability and thickness are also mixed aspects, with some finding them strong and well-made while others report they tear easily and become thinner over time. The scratchiness is a concern, with customers noting they are rough on the nose.

Shop Facial Tissues on Amazon

entry.title: Dish Detergent
entry.content:
Dish Soap. I used to just buy whatever was on sale and not think about it, but then I got married and for a while we are using Mrs.Meyers dishsoap but that shit got expensive in a hurry once we had a kid.

Photo by Brooke Balentine on Unsplash

So, now we just buy the cheapest dish detergent we can find and lately it’s been this one:

Jim’s Pick for Dish Detergent

Amazon.com: Dawn Platinum Powerwash Dish Spray, Dish Soap Liquid, Fresh Scent Bundle

Sure, there’s other more bougie brands that talk about the craft of doing dishes but our job is to get them clean, dry and then use them again hours later usually.

Dawn Platinum Dish Detergent Review

Pros: Cuts through grease easy and the spray bottle is cool

Cons: The strong smell can be off-putting to some

Rating: 4.8 stars

Add to Cart

For the price, this might just very well be the best soap you can buy for cleaning your dishes - unless, you don’t have kids - then you can use the fancy soap.

Shop Dish Detergent on Amazon

entry.title: Ball Point Pens
entry.content:
Photo by Jessica Lewis 🦋 thepaintedsquare on Unsplash

I’m not a pen snob so maybe I’m the wrong person to give advice for pen replacements, but I have heard that getting into pens can get crazy expensive.

Jim’s Pick

Amazon.com : Black Pen Holder Cup for Desk, Black Wire Mesh Pencil Cup Holder for Desk Office Pen Organizer : Office Products

Cheap pens are great because, well - they’re cheap and if you lose them it’s no big deal.

I know there’s reddit groups and clubs all about pens and I’m not that guy as I don’t really have much use for a pen and theres always a pen or two in my [[Glass Pen Holder]] so I haven’t had to buy a pen in a long time so these would do in a pinch.

The only other writing tools I may need would be some [[Pencils]] and maybe [[Sharpie]] or two and I am good to go.

Shop for all pens on Amazon

entry.title: Steel Wool
entry.content:
I only remember using steel wool for cleaning the rust off my bike tires and I doubt I would use it to clean my pots and pan set for daily use as there are more gentle [[2025-12-02-kitchen-sponge.md|ways]] to clean your dishes now.

Photo by yasin hemmati on Unsplash

Jim’s Pick

Amazon.com: Scotch-Brite Stainless Steel Scrubbers, Scouring Pads for Cleaning Tough Baked-On Messes, Metal Scrubbers for Cleaning Dishes, 3 Scrub Pads : Health & Household

I like these over tradition steel wool pads because they don’t have that messy soap built into them already and it’s so, so messy and I have yet to determine if it actually makes a difference so I have to pick the above as my recommendation and just get a bit of your own dish soap to use with these pads and I bet you’re rocking it just as well than those others.

Shop Steel Wool Pads on Amazon

entry.title: Pots and Pan Set
entry.content:
I really don’t care much about pots and pans. I mean, they work and that’s about it.

Photo by Cooker King on Unsplash

Actually, scratch that. Pots and pans do matter because if you eat at home (you should) then you will spend a lot of time cooking and liek th mechanics that pay a lot of money for good tools, every home should have a good pot and pan set.

Jim’s Pick

Amazon.com: Amazon Basics Non Stick Kitchen Cookware 8-Piece Set, Non-Induction, Includes Pots and Pans, Black: Home & Kitchen

Pros: Even heat distribution and easy to clean

Cons: Not the most durable

Rating 4.6 out of five

Buy Now On Amazon

You don’t have to spend a lot of money on a pot and pan set, although you can, it’s optional and if you start with a good starter set it will let you figure out what pots and pans you use the most so when the next time you need a new pot and pan set you have a better day about your needs.

Shop Pots and Pans on Amazon

entry.title: Blue Marlboro Coffee Cup Set
entry.content:
Photo by Asher Ward on Unsplash

We’re not smokers so obviously these did not get bought new or won as a prize, but I think we found these at a garage sale while looking for something completely different.

Jim’s Pick for Blue Coffee Mugs

Amazon.com: Grip 12oz Enamel Coffee Mug - Impact Resistant - Dishwasher Safe Enamel Finish - Great for Campsite, Tailgates, Picnics, BBQs (Blue) : Home & Kitchen

This is a really nice mug. It holds a good amount of coffee or whatever hot drink you want to have. I sometimes am able to get a latte in this mug without issue.

This blue coffee mug had a good hand feel in the hand and seems to work well for me for using every day. They are sturdy and are dishwasher safe which is nice too because nobody wants to wash dishes by hand with a [[2025-12-02-kitchen-sponge.md|kitchen sponge]] because that’s no fun.

Here’s a few other blue coffee mugs to consider:

Amazon.com: vancasso STARRY Ceramic Coffee Mug Set of 6, 12 Oz Tea Cups with Handle for Latte, Tea, Cappuccino, Milk, Cocoa, Microwave&Dishwasher Safe,Blue : Home & Kitchen

Amazon.com: Miicol Ceramic Coffee Mug, 16 oz Large Coffee Cup, Tea Mug with Handle, Flat Bottom Mug for Men, Women, Office, Microwave and Dishwasher Safe, Multi-Color, Navy : Home & Kitchen

Amazon.com: vancasso STARRY Coffee Mugs Set, 12 oz Ceramic Coffee Cups for Latte Hot Tea Cappuccino Cocoa Milk Stoneware Cups Set of 6, Dishwasher & Microwave Safe, Blue : Home & Kitchen

entry.title: These are the Best Dish Cloths
entry.content:
I used to just use the good old j-cloths that I had been using since oh, the eighties at least.

Photo by Brooke Lark on Unsplash

But now, I have better. Because there’s now some cloths that work better than the old dish washing cloths of yesterday.

The problem with the older dish washing cloths of yesterday is that they smelled a lot if you didn’t stay on top of them. The musty smell is one smell I could never get used to, and besides - who wants to wash dishes with an older musty dish cloth that’s a germ factory in fabric farm.

Jim’s Pick

I really like these because they’re sturdy but no too big so you’re not tied up in the cloth while you’re trying to get some dishes washed

Amazon.com: Kitinjoy 100% Cotton Kitchen Dish Cloths, 6 Pack Waffle Weave Ultra Soft Absorbent Dish Towels for Drying Dishes Quick Drying Kitchen Towels Dish Rags, 12 X 12 Inches, Dark Grey : Home & Kitchen

these are great for washing my travel mug for one example as they are very absorbant to get all the old coffee out and have it rinsed and ready for next time.

Here’s a few other dish cloths I like:

Amazon.com: VMKBL 10 Pcs New Upgraded 3 Layers Non Scratch Wire Dishcloth, Multipurpose Wire Dishwashing Rags, Wet & Dry for Cookware, Sinks, Dishes, Stoves & Fireplaces (7.87 x 7.87-10pcs) : Health & Household

Amazon.com: AMOUR INFINI Cotton Kitchen Dish Cloths Set of 8 – Highly Absorbent, Super Soft Premium Terry Cleaning Cloth (12”x12” Inch) Premium Dishcloths for Washing Dishes (Turquoise) : Home & Kitchen

Amazon.com: Bumble Dish Towels & Dish Cloths (8 Pack) | 100% Cotton Kitchen Towels | 12” x 12” | 405 GSM | Soft, Highly Absorbent & Durable Rags for Washing Dishes | Gray : Home & Kitchen

Shop all Dishcloths on Amazon

entry.title: Men's Levi Jeans
entry.content:
Jeans are the quintessential wardrobe item for myself. I have tried to wear many other pants over the years and always come back to jeans.

Jim’s pick for Mens Levi’s Jeans Levi’s Men’s 511 Slim Fit Jeans

Photo by Mnz on Unsplash

Now, especially because now they’re not just plain denim but also some kind of space age stretchy material for those of us with variable waistlines.

I stick to the basic colors and for style, I like the slim fit for my once slim fit, but if I keep eating pie I might have to graduate to relaxed

I suggest waiting for them to go on sale as they tend to frequently because who wants to pay full price for a pair of jeans?

entry.title: Travel Mug.md
entry.content:
Photo by Julian Hochgesang on Unsplash You would think with all this technology available to is we would be able to design a coffee mug that doesn’t spill. I didn’t know I was a coffee cup snob until I was constantly spilling on myself and so I went and did some reading and found that the Contigo cups were pretty good.

I like the fact that you can flip a tab and the opening will close quickly as you don’t have to worry about spilling. I would and definitely have recommend this coffee travel mug.

[!NOTE] Jim’s Pick Contigo coffee mug Amazon.com

Shop more coffee mugs on Amazon.

entry.title: Men's Wallets
entry.content:
Oh, wallets. I’ve had a few in my lifetime but they’ve never seemed to be the one. I had a velcro wallet one once and that was great until you opened it and realized that people were staring.

[!Jim’s Pick] Jim’s Pick - This is the wallet I would buy if I had to do it all over again Amazon.com: Vaultskin MOORGATE Slim Card Holder – Minimalist Leather Wallet with RFID Blocking, Front Pocket Credit Card Case for Men & Women (Royal Blue) : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

I always, always wore my wallet that had every receipt in it from 1985 becausse, you never know when you might need it again.

But then I found out about minimalist wallet. I’m no minimalist as [[We Have That At Home!| this site]] will show over time but man it’s nice to get this thing into your front pocket instead of the back because it’s a lot easier on the back and you don’t have take your wallet out after driving for 40 minutes because you can’t feel your ass anymore.

If my pick doesn’t do it for you there’s a few other wallets that might work and are still minimal:

Amazon.com: The Ridge Wallet - Slim Minimalist Compact Wallet and Card Holder, | RFID Protected Front Pocket Wallets | Integrated Cash Strap | Forest Green : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

Amazon.com: ZALVEX Wallet for Men, Mens Minimalist Wallet 9-13 Cards, Slim Compact Wallet with Money Clip & ID Window, RFID Blocking Smart Pop Up Card Wallet, Metal Aluminum Credit Card Holder Bifold Wallet : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

Amazon.com: ZALVEX Wallet for Men, Mens Minimalist Wallet 9-13 Cards, Slim Compact Wallet with Money Clip & ID Window, RFID Blocking Smart Pop Up Card Wallet, Metal Aluminum Credit Card Holder Bifold Wallet : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

entry.title: Mens Puffer Coat.md
entry.content:
I really don’t care much for what winter coat I have as my current lifestyle is to go from house to car most days and maybe have to stand around and wait for the school bus with my daughter in the am.

I have the Amazon essentials puffer jacket and one of the better features of this jacket is that it is cheap and is often on sale for $20 or so which in 2025 is a great price for a jacket of any kind.

[!NOTE] Jim’s Pick for a lightweight puffer jacket Amazon.com: Amazon Essentials Men’s Packable Lightweight Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket (Available in Big & Tall), Navy, Large : Sports & Outdoors

There’s other jackets you could buy and some are from brands you recognize and then some are from brands you don’t but they are all the same fairly well so just pick one. I like the Amazon one I list above, but if that’s not your bag, then there’s others to choose from.

Shop Men’s Lightweight Puffer Jackets

entry.title: Kid's Skechers Shoes
entry.content:
Jim’s Pick

Skechers Girls Eternal Heart Lights

But, the kiddo loves them more than her sea monkeys so there’s that.

I must warn you that if you’re buying these for your child that they will be clean for all of about 7 seconds. But the good news is that they seem to be washable for the most part and the lights still work after.

Maybe I got lucky with the washing, I dunno but you only get a few month out of these anyway and you can usually find them on sale for about $25 so whatever.

These are great shoes because the child can put them on themselves due to the elastic laces and velcro. I recommend these.

There are other designs and colors if you don’t like my pick, but the skechers are a good brand name sneaker for little growing feet.

Shop Skechers Shoes for Girls on Amazon

entry.title: The Sea Monkeys are Growing
entry.content:
We fed the sea monkeys today and it was okay for us and a little fun and I can’t believe that the sea monkeys are actually growing. I thought she was going to jump out of her shoes when she saw the first monkey swimming in the water.

These are a fun little thing and seem to be age appropriate too.

Here’s a few sea monkeys you can buy if you would like to buy them from Amazon:

Amazon.com: Animagic Aqua Dragons Hatch ‘n’ Grow Basic Tank | Build an Aquatic Ecosystem, Watch Prehistoric Pets Hatch & Grow Science Kit | Ages 6+ : Toys & Games

Amazon.com: Sea-Monkeys® Ocean Zoo Neon - World’s Only Instant Pets® - Assorted Colors - Ages 6+ (Pack of 1) : Toys & Games

entry.title: Trivets for the Table
entry.content:
I like Trivets, I do.

I didn’t know what a trivet was until my late 40’s but now we have them everywhere and they are used almost every day.

What’s a trivet? It’s a thing that allows you to put something hot from the stove and not burn the thing underneath. We use it to serve family style sometimes when we are [[2025-12-03-glass-pen-holder.md| glass pen holder]] lazy.

Jim’s Pick

I’m not that fussy about trivets and so I Trivets just get some cork trivets like these and call it a day:

Amazon.com: Cork Trivets for Hot Dishes, Pots and Pans, Pot Holders for Kitchen, 8 Inches 4 Pack Hot Pads, Thick Heat Resistant Mats Protect Countertop, Coaster Trivet Home Essentials, Rustic Farmhouse Decor: Home & Kitchen

Amazon.com: Cork Trivet, 4 Pack High Density Thick Cork Coasters Set for Hot Dishes, 7.5 Inch Heat Resistant Multifunctional, Hot Pads for Kitchen, Table, Countertops: Home & Kitchen

Shop More Trivets on Amazon

entry.title: Men's Hoodies
entry.content:
This is my favorite hoodie

I have fallen when it comes to fashion. At one time it was all about the look and now comfort trumps all and I live in a hoodie almost all the time now.

Photo by Mediamodifier on Unsplash

Jim’s Pick

If I had to pick one hoodie, it would be this one because, I would like to have no logo at all but I am the odd one and this is the best it gets then it’s this one:

adidas Men’s Essentials Fleece Hoodie, Shadow Brown, Small at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

All you really need is a clean hoodie a white t-shirt underneath and some comfortable shoes and you’re ready to go.

I’m kind of allergic to logos, but the Adidas stuff is well made for the most part so that’s why I would buy this one over others, but there’s a few other options to consider when buying the best hooded sweatshirt for your wardrobe

Also worth considering:

Hanes Men’s Full-Zip Eco-Smart Hoodie, Navy, Large at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

Hanes Men’s Pullover EcoSmart Hooded Sweatshirt, Navy, Large at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

Amazon.com: Amazon Essentials Men’s Pullover Sweatshirt Hoodie, Big & Tall Options Available, Charcoal Heather, Large : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

#clothing #mens #bedroom
